home.title: Piex P2P: Buy/Sell Your Crypto Locally
home.desc: Peer-to-peer exchange (or P2P exchange) is a marketplace where people can trade crypto directly with each other on their own terms, invirtually any country.

orderDetail.desc: The order is created, please wait for system confirmation
orderDetail.transferFundsToSeller: Transfer the funds to the seller's account provided below.
orderDetail.name: Name
orderDetail.afterTransferSeller: After transferring the funds, click on the "Transferred, notify seller" button.
orderDetail.receiveInMinutes: Expected to receive assets in {{minutes}} minutes
orderDetail.paymentFail: Payment method can't be displayed for this order.
orderDetail.sellConfirmMessage: Confirm that the payment is made using the buyer's real name
orderDetail.endSellStep: After confirming the payment, be sure to click the "Payment received" button.

appealModal.title: Appeal
appealModal.input1Validate: Please enter the reason for Appeal.
appealModal.input1Placeholder: I received the payment from partner!
appealModal.input2Placeholder: Please provide as much detail as possible.
appealModal.input3Text: Click or drag file to this area to upload.
appealModal.input3Hint: Screenshot, recording, documents of payment and communication log Size < 5MB

buyModal.title: Confirm Successful Payment
buyModal.desc: Please confirm that payment has been made to the seller. Malicious clicks will lead to account frozen.
buyModal.warning: WARNING : If you click on "Transferred , next" without making the payment (you need to transfer the money with the payment account, not on Piex). Your account will potentially be suspended. The platform reserve the rights to claim any damage caused.

cancelModal.title: Cancel order
cancelModal.desc: Why do you want to cancel the order?
cancelModal.option1: I do not want to trade seller.
cancelModal.option2: I do not meet the requirements of the advertiser's trading terms and condition.
cancelModal.option3: Seller is asking for extra fee.
cancelModal.option4: Problem with seller's payment method result in unsuccessful payments.

sellModal.title: Confirm Release
sellModal.warning: Be sure to confirm receipt of the payment
sellModal.agreement: I have confirmed that the payment was correct.

userCenter.paymentDesc: P2P payment methods: When you sell cryptocurrencies, the payment method added will be displayed to buyer as options to accept payment, please ensure that the account owner’s name is consistent with your verified name on Piex. You can add up to 20 payment methods.
userCenter.name: Name

editUsernameModal.title: Set Nickname
editUsernameModal.desc: It is recommended not to use your real name. Nickname can only be modified once every 365 days.
editUsernameModal.modifiedEvery365Day: You can modify once every 365 days.

deletePaymentModal.warning: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?

addPaymentModal.title: Add payment method
addPaymentModal.name: Name
addPaymentModal.bankAccountNamePlaceholder: Please enter your bank account name
addPaymentModal.bankAccountNumberPlaceholder: Please enter your bank account number
addPaymentModal.bankNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of your bank

postAds.title: Post Normal Ad
postAds.remarksHint: Please do not include any crypto-related words such as crypto, P2P, C2C, BTC, USDT, ETC, US2, etc.
postAds.autoReplyHint: Auto reply message will be sent to the counterparty once the order is created

cancelAd.title: Cancel advertisement
cancelAd.warning: Taker will not see your advertisement after you click Confirm

validation.required: This field can not be empty
validation.amountLessThan: The amount must be larger than or equal to
validation.amountLargerThan: The amount must be less than or equal to
validation.notEnoughToSell: Your balance is not enough to sell
